text:
@LindseyGrahamSC CHINA/WHO! Blame Trump, he has contributed to about 990,000+ infected & 55,000+ dead by ignoring:
-12+ U.S. experts embedded in WHO, who in Dec, gave real-time updates re China Covid-19 outbreak to officials, Alex Azar
-Navarro's 2 Jan Memos
-Covid-19 Intel brief in mid November
